website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful, sturdy vase that is suitable for contemporary and classic homes. Choice of 2 sizes adds to its versatility.
pros: This unique stoneware vase has glossy glaze over geometric patterns that give it a textured appearance and tactile feel
White color is neutral and goes nicely with most room decor
Available in 2 sizes: 6.9 inches or 12.25 inches in height
cons: Although rare, some customers received the wrong vase

customer_reviews.title: Modern dual purpose—a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: Great decor item and vase. It’s always good to find something that looks good when not in use, is modern, and yet doesn’t detract from the bouquet. The size is on the small side for most standard bouquets without some whittling down and fiddling or splitting the bouquet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Watt

customer_reviews.title: I would have spent 5x more
customer_reviews.text: I love this vase. It is well made, designed and durable. If I saw this at a store, I would have immediately bought it for several times the price. I cannot say enough about this last minute compulsive purchase. Buy it as a gift and they would never put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely vase with texture/geometric design
customer_reviews.text: I have quite the collection of vases in lighted cabinets as well as sitting out... I love a variety of colors, sizes and designs. This one really stands out with it's shape and texture. It is a creamy white in color, but the texture adds nice shadows in ambient lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my work station and get so many compliments on it! It’s very beautiful and sturdy! It looks just as pictured and I absolutely love it! This is a vase that I will hopefully keep for a long time. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Apes

customer_reviews.title: Its a lovely vase, if only...
customer_reviews.text: This vase is large, strong, & the texture is awesome. My ONLY complaint & the ONLY reason I had to return was that they made the one they sent with 3 black dots lacquered into the top coat. I was disappointed to see that they sent one out like that, hoping someone would be fine with a stark white (creamy white) vase that has 3 black dots in it!? If they sent me an all white vase, I would have happily kept it & this post would have been 5 stars. I was sad to just return but I cannot be sure that I wouldn't receive the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Francine J

customer_reviews.title: Good decoration.
customer_reviews.text: Big and heavy and beautiful. Just what I was looking for. Haven't used it as a vase... Just wanted it for the visual appeal.
customer_reviews.author: t610

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, modern, a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, modern, stylish. A great value for the money. It's not 100% symmetrical and perfect, a bit irregular around the upper rim. But maybe one should not expect or even desire perfection from a ceramic piece. For the money I'm incredibly happy.
customer_reviews.author: churry

customer_reviews.title: Cute vase!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute but the opening is very small so it’s kind of hard to fit in a lot of flowers. It still has a very pretty design.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: It's like ceramic or something and a few days after I got it the top had a very small piece break off (partly my fault). It isn't noticeable enough for me to complain but still shows that the quality isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for my modern rustic/Hygge/mid century style
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this vase. It’s thick, sturdy and stunning to look at. The opening is quite narrow, so use this for your talk, sleek flowers or greens. Looks phenomenal with a few sprints of eucalyptus!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessity

customer_reviews.title: Brightens my day
customer_reviews.text: Happy with item once it arrived. The first one ordered was damaged during delivery and returned to the manufacturer. May not be super sturdy. Beautiful, modern design. Good value for the price. Used it as part of an arrangement for my desk at work with silk flowers ordered from Amazon. Many complements from coworkers. Brightens my day!
customer_reviews.author: Nikia

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant. Great for home decor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and put flowers in it for Valentine's Day. The opening at the top is very small so you can’t put a dozen roses in it but it is a very neat and elegant design, very eye catching. She uses it for decoration in her apartment now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful eye catching vase. Love the design and it feels very well made. It was packed well to prevent damage during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous modern vase
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous modern vase. Can use almost anywhere. Love the intricate details. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Merz

customer_reviews.title: Lovely vase
customer_reviews.text: I love how versatile this vase is. I can leave it out year round and switch out the flowers and decor and it always looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Meggo

customer_reviews.title: Rivet Modern vase. Very pleased with this item. It looks lovely in my living room.
customer_reviews.text: The vase was delivered on time, in perfect condition. I have gotten a lot of very nice complements. The color, the contemporary style, and the size is exactly what I wanted. It is of good value.
customer_reviews.author: Waldine D. Dyett

customer_reviews.title: Great looking base, design
customer_reviews.text: Great design and looks better than the price would suggest. Looks high-end.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I like the design of this
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this. The vase is more on the creamy side than I was expecting but still like the look overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It looks very modern, clean and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't nearly as nice as the picture and looked cheap much closer to ...
customer_reviews.text: The wrong product was sent. It was a similar vase, but the shape was inverted. It wasn't nearly as nice as the picture and looked cheap much closer to $10 than the $30 it was.
customer_reviews.author: Batsheva Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this vase with my arrangement! Nice and durable too! Wish it was like 2 inches taller but I made the flowers work in it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pray

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous piece, and much better quality than i thought considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vase! It’s is beautiful in person. Great quality and detail, you will not regret buying it! I promise!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Funky and cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this funky vase. It only fits a few stems, but that’s all you need with a design like this.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bethea

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but wrapped in a shipping box that for gifting looks ugly.
customer_reviews.text: This vase is not a box inside the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: hqguy

customer_reviews.title: Very classy and elegant modern addition to our home decor
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quick delivery in a very secure package. I have looked everywhere trying to find a vase like this including Kohl’s and Hobby Lobby but Amazon hit the mark!! Very stable with tall floral arrangements which is essential in any home. You will be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Diva

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend with a mid century design. She loved it, I loved it, it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: neat freak reviews

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most beautiful vases I've seen in a long time. It brought my dining room together and it looks great in the center of my dining room table. didn't think it would look as good as it does but trust when I say, it looks better in person than in the picture. would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LaTonya

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect vase for any live or artificial arrangement. The neck is quite small, but that’s just fine... makes the flowers appear to spill out of the vase. Looks great in my MCM home.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sirianni

customer_reviews.title: Small modern vase
customer_reviews.text: Very modern and geometric. Not sure that it could hold water or a lot of flowers, as it's short and the opening is rather small, but it looks great on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Tanaia Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Modern, Contemporary Vase
customer_reviews.text: I love my new vase. I am into patterns, textures and everything modern and this vase says it all! It is the perfect height for my kitchen table! Thank-you
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as defined in it's "sculpture and color,"  it's not as white as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift and will most likely be great, but I was a bit disappointed in the "look" of it as opposed to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous - but keep away from children and pets
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! But I'm concerned it can be easily knocked over. Base is small and it just feels a bit unsturdy
customer_reviews.author: SilverGirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this; however, the bottom isn't completely flat, so it wobbles a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Y.

customer_reviews.title: Crisp white and both classic and contemporary
customer_reviews.text: Using it as an accent on a table in the hallway.
customer_reviews.author: kengboston

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand – Rivet Modern Geometric Stoneware Home Decor Flower Vase - 6.9 Inch, White
product_meta.description: Size:SmallAn Amazon brand - Textured geometric patterns give this vase a modern, angular flair. The lovely milky white color with transparent glaze will go with any décor. Add flowers if you wish, but this vase can also stand alone as a decorative piece
feature_bullets: Textured geometric patterns give this vase a modern, angular flair. The lovely milky white color with transparent glaze will go with any décor. Add flowers if you wish, but this vase can also stand alone as a decorative piece
Neutral white with modern patterns allow it to blend with any room
Durable stoneware vase great for display or holding flowers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars255 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
